string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: Are you not going to listen to me?
Fine. What if I told you a story?
There once was a deliveryman who came to deliver a box.
He rang the doorbell, and they came to collect the box.
Then, they carefully opened the box.
In the box they saw something covered in bubble wrap.
After carefully removing the wrap, they saw a big button.
On the top of the button there was some large text, which said,
